lead_paragraph: Angela Stanford was clinging to the lead halfway through Safeway International in Superstition Mountain, Ariz. Stanford had a one-shot lead through 36 holes of the L.P.G.A. Tour tournament. She followed her course record and career-best 10-under 62 on Thursday with a three-under 69 on Friday for a 13-under 131 total. Lorena Ochoa, the defending champion and world’s top-ranked female golfer, was one back at 12 under. She began the day three strokes back and shot a 67.
